overview: Damba Zolzaya, the winner of the 2018 World Hmi Competition and  the first female Hmi singer in Aimag, Khovd, the birthplace of Hmi in Mongolia, is enjoying  the happiest moment of her life, receiving public and media attention. It's been a while since she's been with the filming staff for her first Hmi album jacket photo shoot, and  she's a sleeper who will be visiting her hometown of Chandmani. However, her expression towards her hometown is not very bright...
title: My Name Is Zolzaya
